name: Pinata
info: The IPFS module allows you to store data to the IPFS p2p network via the SimpleID node. A content has will be returned. Content is not pinned just by using this module. If you need pinning services, consider adding the Pinata module as well.

name: Blockstack
info: The Blockstack module uses Blockstack's Gaia storage and provides a high-performance cloud solution. Unless your users have deployed their own Gaia storage hub, this module makes use of SimpleID's default hub.

name: IPFS
info: The IPFS module allows you to store data to the IPFS p2p network via the SimpleID node. A content has will be returned. Content is not pinned just by using this module. If you need pinning services, consider adding the Pinata module as well.
